description: The PATIENT table contains one record for each patient in your system. The data contained in each record consists of demographics, PCP and primary location information, registration information, and other information.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used by other tables to link to PATIENT.

columns.name: PAT_NAME
columns.description: The patient�s name in the format Lastname, Firstname MI.

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: The city in which the patient lives.

columns.name: STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the state in which the patient lives.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the county in which the patient lives.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the country in which the patient lives.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code area in which the patient lives.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The patient�s home phone number.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The patient�s work phone number.

columns.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS
columns.description: The patient�s e-mail address.

columns.name: BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the patient was born.

columns.name: ETHNIC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the patient�s ethnic background. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RELIGION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the patient�s religion. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the patient�s language.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SSN
columns.description: The patient�s Social Security Number. This number is formatted as 999-99-9999, and a single trailing alphabetic character is also allowed.

columns.name: REG_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the last patient verification occurred.  If a patient was verified and then re-verified at a later date, this column will show the re-verified date.  This column will be null for patients that have never been verified.

columns.name: REG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the patient�s status in terms of the patient registration process as of the enterprise reporting extract. This is a customizable list, examples may include: 1 � New, 2 � Verified, and so on.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEDICARE_NUM
columns.description: The patient�s Medicare-assigned identification number, if applicable.

columns.name: MEDICAID_NUM
columns.description: Patient's Medicaid ID.

columns.name: ADV_DIRECTIVE_YN
columns.description:
This column contains the value �Y� if the patient has a signed living will on file with your facility indicating how they want their health chare to be handled in the event of an incapacitating emergency. This information is entered in clinical system. If the patient has no signed living will on file this column contains the value �N�.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ADV_DIRECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The date a living will was received from the patient.

columns.name: CUR_PCP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider record for the patient�s current General Primary Care Provider as of the enterprise reporting extract. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: CUR_PRIM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location record for the patient�s Primary Location as of the time of the enterprise reporting extract. This column is retrieved from the item Primary Location.

columns.name: LEGAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medical and/or legal status associated with the patient�s death. This item is populated through Admission/Discharge/Transfer (ADT) workflows.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: BIRTH_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the newborn�s status at birth as entered in ADT.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PED_MULT_BIRTH_ORD
columns.description: For multiple births, the place in the birth order of the current newborn patient.

columns.name: PED_MULT_BIRTH_TOT
columns.description: The total number of births during the mother�s labor and delivery of this newborn patient.

columns.name: CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who entered this patient�s record. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: PAT_MRN_ID
columns.description: The patient's medical record number (MRN), of the type associated with the patient's current primary location.

columns.name: DEATH_DATE
columns.description: The date of death for the patient.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who created this patient�s record. This ID may be encrypted.   NOTE: For historical reasons, the column name ends in PAT_ID and cannot be changed; despite its name, it does not link to patient ID. It instead links to CLARITY_EMP.USER_ID.

columns.name: ORGAN_DONOR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient is an organ donor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: TMP_CITY
columns.description: Contains the city in which the patient is temporarily residing.

columns.name: TMP_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the state in which the patient is temporarily residing.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: TMP_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the country in which the patient is temporarily residing.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: COUNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: TMP_ZIP
columns.description: Contains the ZIP Code in which the patient is temporarily residing.

columns.name: TMP_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: Contains the temporary phone number where the patient can be reached.

columns.name: TMP_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the county in which the patient is temporarily residing.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: TMP_ADDR_START_DT
columns.description: Contains the starting effective date of the patients temporary address information.

columns.name: TMP_ADDR_END_DT
columns.description: Contains the ending effective date of the patients temporary address information.

columns.name: TMP_CARE_OF_PERSON
columns.description: Contains the name of the contact person for the patient at the temporary residence.

columns.name: PAT_LAST_NAME
columns.description: The last name of the patient.

columns.name: PAT_FIRST_NAME
columns.description: The first name of the patient.

columns.name: PAT_MIDDLE_NAME
columns.description: The middle name of the patient.

columns.name: PAT_TITLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's title, e.g. Mr., Mrs., Miss, Dr., etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ms.


Mr.


Miss


Mrs.


Dr.


Fr.


Sr.


Rev.


Lord


King


Queen


Prince


Princess


Sheikh


Sheikha

columns.name: PAT_NAME_SUFFIX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The suffix to the patient's name, e.g. Jr., Sr., III, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Sr.


Jr.


II


III


IV


V

columns.name: SPECIAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special status of the patient, such as employee or VIP.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LANG_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's preferred language to receive care.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LANGUAGE_C_NAME

columns.name: LANG_WRIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's preferred language to receive written material.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LANGUAGE_C_NAME

columns.name: PROXY_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient has a proxy already.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PROXY_PACK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the proxy packet was given to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID of the patient's employer if the item linking the patient to an employer (I EAF 6410) is set to 1.  This is free text if the item linking the patient to an employer (I EAF 6410) is set to 2.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: EMPY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The employee's employment status (e.g. Full Time, Part time, Not Employed, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Full Time


Part Time


Not Employed


Self Employed


Retired


On Active Military Duty


Student - Full Time


Student - Part Time


Unknown

columns.name: GUARDIAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient's legal guardian, if any.

columns.name: PREF_CLIN_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the patient's preferred clinic.

columns.name: PREF_PCP_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the sex of the patient's preferred primary care physician.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: PREF_PCP_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the specialty of the patient's preferred physician.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PREF_PCP_LANG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the language of the patient's preferred primary care physician.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LANGUAGE_C_NAME

columns.name: COUNTRY_OF_ORIG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds data on the country in which a patient was born


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: COUNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: PED_CESAREAN_YN
columns.description:
This column contains the value "Y" if the patient was delivered by Cesarean Section. If the patient was not delivered by Cesarean Section, this column contains the value "N".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PED_NOUR_METH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the patient's pediatric nourishment method.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Breast Fed


Bottle Fed


Unknown


Not Asked


Bottle Fed - Breast Milk


Bottle Fed - Formula

columns.name: PED_DELIVR_METH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the patient's delivery method at birth.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Vaginal, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Transverse


Vertical C-Section


C-Section, Unspecified


Vaginal, Vacuum (Extractor)


Vaginal, Forceps


Vaginal, Breech


Non-Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery


VBAC, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Vertical


C-Section, Classical


Biochemical

columns.name: PED_MULTI_BIRTH_YN
columns.description:
This column contains the value "Y" if the patient is one of a multiple birth.  This column contains the value "N" if the patient was a single birth.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORGAN_DONOR_YN

columns.name: EDD_DT
columns.description: The patient's Expected Date of Delivery.

columns.name: EDD_ENTERED_DT
columns.description: Date the Expected Date of Delivery was entered.

columns.name: EDD_CMT
columns.description: Expected Date of Delivery comment.

columns.name: INTRPTR_NEEDED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient needs an interpreter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORGAN_DONOR_YN

columns.name: PCP_DON_CHART_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the primary care physician has finished moving all the information from the paper chart into the system.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORGAN_DONOR_YN

columns.name: PAT_HAS_IOL_YN
columns.description:
This item is used as a data item to mark those patients having intraocular lenses.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORGAN_DONOR_YN

columns.name: PED_BIRTH_LABOR
columns.description: Stores the duration of labor related to a patient's birth history.

columns.name: PED_HOSP_DAYS
columns.description: Stores the number of days spent in the hospital related to a patient's birth history.

columns.name: MEDS_LAST_REV_TM
columns.description: Stores the last time the encounter medications list was reviewed.

columns.name: MEDS_LST_REV_USR_ID
columns.description: Stores the last user to review the encounter medications list.

columns.name: SELF_EC_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: Most recent date patient marked their emergency contact information as verified.

columns.name: SELF_EC_VERIF_ST_YN
columns.description:
The status of the patient's last verified emergency contact request (e.g. verified yes or no).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EMPR_ID_CMT
columns.description: A free text comment that can be entered when the value that is considered to be "Other" is selected as the employer. This option is available only if your organization has chosen to link the patient employer to the Employer (EEP) master file in the Facility Profile.

columns.name: PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the patient status. Possible statuses include alive and deceased.  Note that there are many patient creation workflows that do not populate this item so many alive patients could have blank statuses.   If using this column to report on the Alive or Deceased status of a patient population use PATIENT_4.PAT_LIVING_STAT_C instead.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Alive


Deceased

columns.name: MEDS_LAST_REV_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number of the encounter in which the patient's current medications list was last reviewed.

columns.name: SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number corresponding to the patient's sex.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PREF_PCP_SEX_C_NAME
